body.raw:
{
   
       "teachingPlan": [
            {
                "Week": 1,
                "LectureName": "Foundations of Artificial Intelligence",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Definition of AI",
                    "History of AI",
                    "Applications of AI",
                    "Types of AI (Narrow, General, Super)",
                    "AI vs. Machine Learning vs. Deep Learning"
                ],
                "Assignments": true,
                "Exam": "none",
                "ProjectTask": null
            },
            {
                "Week": 2,
                "LectureName": "Intelligent Agents and Search Algorithms",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Rational Agents",
                    "Agent Environments",
                    "Problem-Solving Agents",
                    "Uninformed Search Strategies (BFS, DFS, UCS)",
                    "Informed Search Strategies (Greedy Best-First, A*)"
                ],
                "Assignments": true,
                "Exam": "none",
                "ProjectTask": null
            },
            {
                "Week": 3,
                "LectureName": "Knowledge Representation and Logical Reasoning",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Knowledge-Based Agents",
                    "Propositional Logic",
                    "First-Order Logic",
                    "Inference Rules",
                    "Ontologies",
                    "Semantic Networks"
                ],
                "Assignments": true,
                "Exam": "none",
                "ProjectTask": "Project Introduction: Define project scope and choose a topic related to AI applications (e.g., a simple search agent, a knowledge-based system)."
            },
            {
                "Week": 4,
                "LectureName": "Introduction to Machine Learning",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Types of Machine Learning (Supervised, Unsupervised, Reinforcement)",
                    "Regression (Linear, Polynomial)",
                    "Classification (Logistic Regression, Decision Trees)",
                    "Model Evaluation Metrics"
                ],
                "Assignments": true,
                "Exam": "none",
                "ProjectTask": "Begin data collection or simulated data generation for your chosen project."
            },
            {
                "Week": 5,
                "LectureName": "Neural Networks: Foundations",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Biological Neurons vs. Artificial Neurons",
                    "Perceptrons",
                    "Activation Functions",
                    "Feedforward Networks",
                    "Backpropagation"
                ],
                "Assignments": true,
                "Exam": "none",
                "ProjectTask": "Implement a basic machine learning model (e.g., linear regression, logistic regression) or a simple neural network for your project."
            },
            {
                "Week": 6,
                "LectureName": "Deep Learning Architectures",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)",
                    "Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs)",
                    "Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM)",
                    "Transfer Learning"
                ],
                "Assignments": true,
                "Exam": "none",
                "ProjectTask": "Start integrating deeper learning concepts or more complex algorithms into your project, if applicable."
            },
            {
                "Week": 7,
                "LectureName": "Midterm Exam",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Comprehensive review of topics from Weeks 1-6."
                ],
                "Assignments": false,
                "Exam": "midterm",
                "ProjectTask": "Mid-project check-in and consultation with instructor."
            },
            {
                "Week": 8,
                "LectureName": "Natural Language Processing: Basics",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Text Preprocessing",
                    "Tokenization",
                    "Stemming",
                    "Lemmatization",
                    "Bag-of-Words",
                    "TF-IDF",
                    "Word Embeddings"
                ],
                "Assignments": true,
                "Exam": "none",
                "ProjectTask": "Begin integrating NLP or Computer Vision components into your project, if relevant."
            },
            {
                "Week": 9,
                "LectureName": "Advanced NLP Techniques",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Language Models (N-gram, RNN-based)",
                    "Sequence-to-Sequence Models",
                    "Transformers (Attention Mechanism)",
                    "NLP Applications (Machine Translation, Sentiment Analysis)"
                ],
                "Assignments": true,
                "Exam": "none",
                "ProjectTask": "Refine NLP/Computer Vision models and prepare for initial project demonstration."
            },
            {
                "Week": 10,
                "LectureName": "Introduction to Computer Vision",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Image Representation",
                    "Image Filtering",
                    "Feature Extraction (SIFT, HOG)",
                    "Object Detection (R-CNN, YOLO)",
                    "Image Segmentation",
                    "Facial Recognition"
                ],
                "Assignments": true,
                "Exam": "none",
                "ProjectTask": "Focus on improving project performance and addressing any technical challenges."
            },
            {
                "Week": 11,
                "LectureName": "AI in Robotics and Reinforcement Learning",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Robot Kinematics",
                    "Robot Sensing",
                    "Path Planning",
                    "Introduction to Reinforcement Learning (Agent, Environment, Reward)",
                    "Q-Learning",
                    "Deep Q-Networks"
                ],
                "Assignments": true,
                "Exam": "none",
                "ProjectTask": "Finalize project implementation, prepare documentation and presentation materials."
            },
            {
                "Week": 12,
                "LectureName": "AI Ethics, Bias, and Future Directions",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Ethical Considerations in AI",
                    "Algorithmic Bias",
                    "AI Safety",
                    "Explainable AI (XAI)",
                    "AI's Impact on Society and Employment",
                    "Emerging Trends in AI"
                ],
                "Assignments": false,
                "Exam": "none",
                "ProjectTask": "Final Project Submission and Presentations."
            },
            {
                "Week": 13,
                "LectureName": "Final Exam",
                "Subtopics": [
                    "Comprehensive review of all course topics."
                ],
                "Assignments": false,
                "Exam": "final",
                "ProjectTask": null
            }
        ]
    
}
